name: SocialPostMassApprovalInput

fields.name: isApproved
fields.description: Specifies whether to approve (true) or reject (false) publishing the social posts. If unspecified, defaults to false.

fields.name: socialPost​IdList
fields.description: A list of up to 200 social post IDs.

description: List of social post ids and the action to approve or reject publishing them.
